AssistantSid.description: The SID of the [Assistant](https://www.twilio.com/docs/autopilot/api/assistant) that is the parent of the Task associated with the resources to delete.

TaskSid.description: The SID of the [Task](https://www.twilio.com/docs/autopilot/api/task) associated with the Sample resource to delete.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Sample resource to delete.
